column2: BRIEF-Ericsson And U.S. Cellular Increase Mobile Broadband Capacity During Pandemic April 21 (Reuters) - Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson : * ERICSSON - CO AND U.S. CELLULAR INCREASE MOBILE BROADBAND CAPACITY DURING PANDEMIC * ERICSSON - BEGAN BOOSTING MOBILE BROADBAND CAPACITY DUE TO INCREASED DEMAND FOR DATA USAGE DURING COVID-19 PANDEMIC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-United States Cellular Says On May 10, Co Entered Into $300 Mln Credit Agreement - SEC Filing May 16 (Reuters) - United States Cellular Corp: * UNITED STATES CELLULAR SAYS ON MAY 10, CO ENTERED INTO $300 MILLION CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING Source text: [bit.ly/2GnRyUy] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-United States Cellular Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.52 May 1 (Reuters) - United States Cellular Corp: * Q1 REVENUE $942 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $948.7 MILLION * SEES 2018 TOTAL OPERATING REVENUES $3,850 MILLION TO $4,050 MILLION * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $3.93 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
